doc.field: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials

This series collects various uncataloged serials and publications documenting the labor movement outside of the United States. The series contains significant quantities of material documenting unionization in Canada -- organizations include the Canadian Labour Congress; Canadian Union of Public Employees; and the Co-Operative Union of Canada -- as well as in Europe. The series also contains reports and publications issued by international bodies concerning globalization, environmental regulation, and regionally specific elements of the labor movement, specifically in Vietnam (Vietnamese Trade Unions); Japan ("Problems and Difficulties" of Japanese Workers Today: Towards the Extraction of Needs); the United Kingdom (Future of British Agriculture).
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials
